title: imul instruction with three operands
content: I want to use a imul instruction with 3 operands. Is the destination operand the first or last? I searched the web and got contradictory informations.

answers_data.content:
It depends on the assembly "flavor" you are using: In 
Intel
syntax the destination operand is the first one. In 
AT&T
syntax it is the last one.
